name: AVContentKeyRecipient
desc: A protocol for requiring decryption keys for media data.

items.name: var mayRequireContentKeysForMediaDataProcessing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the recipient requires decryption keys for media data to enable processing.

items.name: func contentKeySession(AVContentKeySession, didProvide: AVContentKey)
items.desc: Tells the recipient that a content key is available.
